p: The MTT assay showed that the RGR of the cells decreased with the increase of drug concentration. When the drug concentration exceeded 20μM, compared with Res powder, the RGR of Res SMEDDS was smaller and statistically significant (P <0. 05) ( Table 8), which demonstrated that Res SMEDDS was slightly higher cytotoxic to PC12 cells than that of Res powder due to slightly toxic of the components in SMEDDS. However, according to the RGR classification of ISO 10993-5-2009 standard, the cytotoxicity of each concentration group of Res SMEDDS belongs to "1" grade( Table 8), therefore, Res SMEDDS with a concentration below 100 μM was safe[ 41].
